runs.comm: al-Amin sprays the first ball way down the leg side, superb attempt by Mushfiqur to stop that one, had to fly to his left to get a hand on it
dropped, a flat-batted slap to a shortish ball, bit of a top edge and the ball flies towards the bowler, over Al-amin's head, he can get his fingers on it but can't latch on
fierce hit towards cover, no placement though
shortish ball, Irfan wants to slog this over midwicket but misses
short of length ball just outside off, Irfan puts away the big strokes and fishes at this one, terrific line from Al-Amin
this is goes miles high, the crowd is expectant but it lands just beyond the reach of mid-on, Irfan is happy throwing his bat around at everything though the required rate is less than six
that's a humongous hit from Irfan, high and way beyond the midwicket rope, Hong Kong 10 for 0 after the first over, in stark contrast to Bangladesh who lost two in their first over
length ball well outside off from Shakib, steered towards backward point, think about the single but decide against it
shakib does the trick for Bangladesh, the crowd finds its voice again, he has Waqas stranded way out of his crease after firing the ball outside off, an easy stumping for Mushfiqur
length ball is driven towards point off the front foot
full and wide, driven towards long-off for a single
on the pads, looking to work the ball to the leg side but can't connect, off the pads towards square leg, decide against the single
driven towards mid-off to end the over, just one off it and one wicket, what will Bangladesh do without Shakib?
fires it down the leg side, off the pads, and pops up to the keeper
length ball is punched towards Shakib at extra cover, a tight single taken

Irfan continues his merry way, slammed through cover for four, just a bit of width for him to work with and that races for four, and what's worse for Bangladesh, the ball will now be soaked with dew after that shot
gets forward and defends this time
slides it down the leg side, can't get bat on it or his pads out of the way

dropped, tough chance for Rubel at short third man, it looped towards him, he dived forward and managed to get there in time, but needed something special to pluck that low chance, Rubel seems to have hurt his fingers in the attempt as well, that too his right hand - the bowling hand
length ball on middle and leg, Atkinson stays well inside the crease and defends somewhat ungainly fashion
looks to sweep this but it is down the leg side, a free run for Hong Kong
a huge lbw appeal but that looked to be heading down the leg side, Atkinson was looking to sweep again
on the pads once more, a length ball is worked towards square leg for a single
once more on the pads, looking to defend that one, he misses and is hit on the pads, going down
worked towards midwicket for a single
heading for middle stump this time, driven towards long-off for a single, Nepal's chances slowly fading
clipped towards deep square leg for a single
Irfan didn't seem to have hit that too hard, he just gets his front leg out of the way and swings at it, gets enough to clear the long-on boundary
quicker one, just outside off, chopped past point for four, didn't have much room to play the cut but he does somehow, Irfan becoming a cult hero in Nepal
drops it short this time, 101kph, defended towards midwicket
short and wide, poor bowling that from Razzaq, slammed through covers for four, no trouble putting that away
solid forward defensive to end the over
Atkinson goes for the big swing, but misses the flighted delivery outside off
full ball is driven towards long-off
length ball is defended towards the bowler
huge appeal for lbw, looked close but that hit on middle and leg and was heading down
pushed back towards the bowler
can't get bat on ball, on the pads and once more it is heading down leg so no chance of an lbw, Shakib dragging Bangladesh to the Super 10s here. 3-0-6-1 in the Powerplay, outstanding effort
short of length ball is pushed towards mid-off for a single
short of length ball angling in towards middle, cuts off any room to free the arms, awkwardly defended down the track
shortish ball well outside off, can't connect
more power-packed clubbing from Irfan Ahmed, swings his bat across and sends that soaring beyond the midwicket boundary
short of length ball on off stump, pushed towards cover
thick inside-edge onto the pads to end the over
there's that man Shakib again, he's got rid of Irfan Ahmed here, and surely Bangladesh are now through to the Super 10s, that pitched just outside off and spun in to hit in line, plumb
spins in from outside off, defended off the front foot
defended back towards the bowler
length ball on leg stump, nudged towards midwicket, races back for the second
length ball is driven towards long-on for a single

and another one for Shakib, Atkinson is lbw, he has been struck on the pads often today, this time the ball was going to gon on to hit the stumps, he's gone, and Shakib finishes with 4-0-9-3 in a crunch game, top stuff
a short of length ball outside off, a thick edge sends the ball towards third man
slanting in towards off stump, defended to the leg side
nearly another wicket there for Bangladesh, a thick inside-edge sends the ball past the stumps, could so easily have taken out one of the stumps there
short of length ball is slapped towards sweeper cover to bring up the 50
just outside off, blocked back towards the bowler

sensational catch from Mushfiqur Rahim, full-stretch to his right to pouch an acrobatic catch, that's wicket number four for Bangladesh, who will now start thinking of the win, instead of being content with just scraping into the Super 10s, that was a thick edge and Mushfiqur had to make plenty of ground to get a glove on that
five down, the Chittagong crowd is delirious, Mahmudullah has struck first ball, that slides in towards off and middle, Chapman gets a thin inside edge, the stumps are in disarray
beaten outside off this time, suddenly Hong Kong can't get bat on ball, Bangladesh all over them
nudged towards square leg
length ball way outside off stump, defended off the front foot towards cover
blocked to the off side once more
gets forward and blocks to the leg side
length ball is driven towards sweeper cover, he was looking to go straighter, a thick outside edge
on the pads, clipped behind square leg this time
angling in towards middle, steered towards backward point for a single
short of length and well outside off, guided down towards third man
no footwork at all as he looks to thrash that ball through the off side, it was well away from off but he made no attempt to get closer to it
length ball is defended towards short cover
opens the face to send the ball towards point and gets a single
driven towards midwicket this time
driven towards long-off for one more
laps that away towards deep backward square leg for a single
spins in sharply towards middle, defended towards midwicket off the back foot
clipped to square leg for a single to end the over
short of length ball is whipped towards wide long-on
on the pads, worked towards midwicket
a boundary after what seems like a long time, gets well back in the crease and flicks it behind square leg for four
nudged towards square leg for a single
defended towards point for a single
length ball is dropped to the off side for a quick single
Bangladesh are through to the Super 10s, this ball is fired well outside off, beats the outside edge
length ball is defended to the off side for a quick single,
towards backward point for a single
a top-edged slog towards midiwcket, lands safely and there's time to take a second
steered to short third man for one more, Hong Kong cutting out the risky strokes and focusing on the singles, good strategy that
well outside off, wanted to carve that past point but misses out, 36 needed off 36 now

it's all happening out there, a wide delivery was guided towards deep backward point for what seemed like a boundary, instead a superb sprinting effort from the third man fielder keeps the ball from reaching the rope, meanwhile Dar was rushing back for the second, and Mushfiqur was rushing across to collect the throw, the two collide painfully, and Dar is on the floor, needing the physio's attention, he seems okay after a bit of time to regain his breath

guided down to third man for a single, racing through the first this time, unlike the previous one which he though was going for four and dawdled the first run, would have got three instead of two in the previous ball otherwise
flicked towards deep midwicket, good work by the man there in the deep
length ball on the pads, sent towards square leg for a single
poked towards point, no run this time though
short of length ball is slugged towards long-on for a single, not timed very well
Dar goes for the reverse-sweep this time, he has usually put away the high-risk strokes, this time he goes for it and misses, and luckily for him the ball misses the off stump
swept to backward square for a tight single
backs away from the stumps, the bowler follows the batsman, who punches the ball towards long-on
Dar defends towards point for a single, the wagonwheel for his innings will look very interesting, how many runs has he scored behind point?
punched towards extra cover but can't beat Shakib there

holes out to deep backward square leg to the deafening roar of the Chittagong crowd, Mahmudullah gets wickets off the first and last balls of his spell, this was whipped hard, it flew flat and fast but straight to the man in the deep, a thrilling finish coming up
a short ball, Dar goes for the pull and there's a top edge, it sends the ball; high but also fine, too fine for the man in the deep and that's a boundary
what a hit that is! right out of the middle and clobbers that over the bowler's head for six, till now his main scoring strokes had been dabs and sweeps, this one is as clean a hit as you will see
after taking 10 off the first two deliveries, he defends the third to the off side
thick edge for four more, Dar going for a wild swipe and gets it nowhere near the middle, still enough to fly wide of the keeper for four more, Hong Kong getting close now
full ball is slapped towards deep point for a single
full ball on middle and off, squeezed out towards mid-on
an lbw appeal but was going down, off the pads behind square leg for a leg-bye
spinning away after pitching on middle, defended from deep in the crease
keeps low after pitching back of a length, defended to the leg side
off the pads for another leg-bye, towards short fine leg

another twist to this extraordinary game, Dar is gone lbw, Hong Kong have lost their seventh, can they hold their nerve to complete the upset? that was a length ball pitching just outside off and heading towards off, Dar missed it and no doubt about that umpiring decision
blocked back to the bowler to end an over, in which there were only two leg-byes and the wicket of Dar

that was a horrible delivery, but nearly got him a wicket, that was a half-tracker that was heading down the leg side, somehow gets entangled in the batsman's body and is nearly dragged on to the stumps
goes for a big swipe, he misses and that just misses leg stump, close call that
nothing close about that, Afzal wanted to launch that into orbit with a massive slog, he missed and the stumps are a mess, he won't be looking back at this innings fondly, it was woeful batting
full ball on off stump, driven towards long-off for a single, eight needed from eight
length ball is pushed towards sweeper cover for a risk-free two
on the pads, defended towards short midwicket, the crowd roar as it is a dot ball, six needed off the final over
Razzak's first ball is driven towards long-on for a single, five needed off five now
hello, a lofted drive over extra cover, just a chip that fetches him a couple, brings it down to three needed
flighted ball, length ball is driven towards deep extra cover, Hong Kong have levelled the scores

finishes it off in style, a length ball on middle and off, a one-handed six over extra cover, Amjad's going to be talking about that shot for a long,long time, a famous win for Hong Kong, a day to forget for Bangladesh, though they have qualified for the Super 10s
